name: Giger-Tetris
overview: Giger Tetris is commercially released puzzle game based on the original Tetris by Alexey Pajitnov in 1984, this one created by Panic Production. It's a rather tenuous link to the artist, H.R.Giger as it only has the one Giger image in the background, So mostly it's Tetris... with some classical music playing.
